title: NeXT-IMDL: Build Benchmark for NeXT-Generation Image Manipulation Detection & Localization
summary: The accessibility surge and abuse risks of user-friendly image editing models have created an urgent need for generalizable, up-to-date methods for Image Manipulation Detection and Localization (IMDL). Current IMDL research typically uses cross-dataset evaluation, where models trained on one benchmark are tested on others.
